version_description:
New! We made it much easier to find any location!

Moovit can now help you choose the most relevant search result by showcasing their distances from your current location.

It is now easier to decide between search results by previewing them on a map. Type where you want to go and tap ‘Show on map’ to display the search locations.

Do you know the location of where you want to go, but you don't have the exact address? No problem, you can plan your route by selecting a location from our map. Tap on ‘Where do you want to go’ and select ‘Choose on map' to start planning your trip.

We’re rolling out “Alternative Lines” feature to over 500 cities! Ever wonder if another bus or metro can take you to your destination? Now, you can see all the alternative routes and options that will get you to your destination from any given station.

Check out “New In This Version” blog under the side menu in order to learn more about this feature and to see if it's available in your city.

Enjoy Moovit? Give us a 5-star review in the store!

We’re rolling out “Alternative Lines” feature to over 500 cities! Ever wonder if another bus or metro can take you to your destination? Now, you can see all the alternative routes and options that will get you to your destination from any given station.

Check out “New In This Version” blog under the side menu in order to learn more about this feature and to see if it's available in your city.

Enjoy Moovit? Give us a 5-star review in the store!

- Find suggested routes with one tap by adding a location to your favorites. You can access favorite locations from the home screen or from the search screen.
- We fixed the Get Off Alerts bug for our VoiceOver users.
- Enjoy using Moovit? Please take a minute to rate us with 5-star review on the App Store!

- Find suggested routes with one tap by adding a location to your favorites. You can access favorite locations from the home screen or from the search screen.
- We fixed the Get Off Alerts bug for our VoiceOver users.
- Enjoy using Moovit? Please take a minute to rate us with 5-star review on the App Store!

► Moovit now supports LARGER text fonts. Learn how to change the size of your iPhone’s fonts in our in-app blog!
► Moovit is proud to support industry-­leading Accessibility features that can help all users get around their city more smoothly.
► Enjoy using Moovit? Please take a minute to rate us with 5-star review on the App Store

We are constantly working to make your public transit experience even better. We are always searching for better routes, updating new schedules, mapping out new stations, and working behind the scenes to make sure our app works smoothly.

Every update is carefully thought out by our team with your experience in mind.

Enjoy our app? Give us a five-star rating in the App Store. We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@mooviapp.com

We improved the way service alerts are communicated in the app.
We now show a notification bar at the bottom of the screen, if you select a transit line with an active service alert. Now you can see the level of service disruption and a short summary of the changes before you plan your trip.

Enjoy our app? Give us a five-star rating in the App Store. We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovit.com

Enjoy our app? Give us a five-star rating in the App Store. We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovit.com

NEW Line on Map: You can now easily track your line, and see where it is, compared to where you are. Watch its progress on the map while in Live Directions, or see the little icon move between stations on the Line Detail screen. Either way – you’ll know where to find your line and ride with greater peace of mind.

Instant Directions to your Favorite Locations: Viewing your way home has never been easier with the new Instant Directions to your Favorite locations. If you’ve set your home or your work addresses as a Favorite, Moovit will automatically calculate and show you the best direction from your current location, including the line you should ride and its departure time. Want to see all your options? Simply tap on Home or Work and get all the Suggested Routes you can take there. So make sure to set your favorites!

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

We’ve redesigned our Itinerary actions, and made them more accessible. So now you can quickly and easily:
- Get step-by-step directions to your destination including "Get off Alerts"
- Share your route with others via WhatsApp, Email and other social networks so they'll know where to meet you and how to get there
- Help other rides by reporting station or line conditions such as crowdedness, incidents and more...

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

* Have a frequently used station? Make it a Favorite! It will be saved to the Directions screen, for you to easily navigate to it, and see upcoming departures.
* Standing in the street and not sure which station is yours? You can now easily recognize it, as you can see its photo in the Itinerary, the Route Preview, and the Live Directions screens (in addition to tapping on the icon on the Station Details screen, as usual). If there is no picture - you can easily add it for the benefit of others.
* Is there a place you often search for? Search no more! You can now easily save it as a Favorite from your Recent Searches, for quick and easy access from the Direction screen.

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

Bugs fixed.

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

A new and improved way to search for lines:
* We’ve improved our lines’ screen, so you can now filter the different lines by transit type.
* We now show line service alerts right next to each line name, so you can easily see if there are changes to your line at a glance
* We’ve moved the transit agencies service alerts, which are not connected to specific lines, and their Twitter feeds to the side menu, so they’re easier to find too.
* Lines’ Twitter feeds are now found on the Lines Screen

Enjoy our app? Give us a five-star rating in the App Store. We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovit.com

A new and improved way to search for lines:
* We’ve improved our lines’ screen, so you can now filter the different lines by transit type.
* We now show line service alerts right next to each line name, so you can easily see if there are changes to your line at a glance
* We’ve moved the transit agencies service alerts, which are not connected to specific lines, and their Twitter feeds to the side menu, so they’re easier to find too.
* Lines’ Twitter feeds are now found on the Lines Screen

Enjoy our app? Give us a five-star rating in the App Store. We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovit.com

We know how important it is to plan your daily public transit commutes, so we made it easier to be notified about new service alerts for your favorite lines, so there are no unforeseen setbacks.

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

It’s now easier to save Favorites, just choose a location from your recent search.

New areas that have been added to Moovit this month: Concepción del Uruguay, Villa Carlos Paz (Argentina); Porto Ferreira, Curitibanos (Brazil); Malatya, Bilecik (Turkey); Los Ángeles (Chile); Shizuoka Prefecture (Japan); Lugo (Spain); Xanthi (Greece); Nalchik (Russia); Boulogne-sur-Mer (France)

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

If there is no picture - you can easily add it for the benefit of others.

We’ve added direction arrow to every line’s route-map, so you can easily tell where your line is heading, and even on which side of the street you should be waiting.
Sync your calendar with Moovit to plan routes to your meetings and appointments with a single tap.

After connecting your calendar to Moovit, all your meetings that include a location or address in them will appear on the home screen.
We have improved our feedback process, and we invite you to share any suggestions for improvement, issues or even complaints you might have about using the app, on our brand-new feedback form.
Just tap on the side menu icon, tap Feedback, and tell us everything! Our team goes over all the requests, and someone will definitely get back to you as soon as possible.

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

We have improved our feedback process, and we invite you to share any suggestions for improvement, issues or even complaints you might have about using the app, on our brand-new feedback form.
Just tap on the side menu icon, tap Feedback, and tell us everything! Our team goes over all the requests, and someone will definitely get back to you as soon as possible.

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

NEW Line on Map: You can now easily track your line, and see where it is, compared to where you are. Watch its progress on the map while in Live Directions, or see the little icon move between stations on the Line Detail screen. Either way – you’ll know where to find your line and ride with greater peace of mind.

Instant Directions to your Favorite Locations: Viewing your way home has never been easier with the new Instant Directions to your Favorite locations. If you’ve set your home or your work addresses as a Favorite, Moovit will automatically calculate and show you the best direction from your current location, including the line you should ride and its departure time. Want to see all your options? Simply tap on Home or Work and get all the Suggested Routes you can take there. So make sure to set your favorites!

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

You asked – we listened. Moovit has a new dark mode! From now on, iOS 13 users can enjoy this slick, new look, which is both easier on the eyes (especially for nighttime navigations) and also a battery saver.

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

We are constantly working to make your public transit experience even better. We are always searching for better routes, updating new schedules, mapping out new stations, and working behind the scenes to make sure our app works smoothly.

Every update is carefully thought out by our team with your experience in mind.

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

Finding your stops and stations just got a whole lot easier! Way Finder (BETA), our new addition to Live Directions, will help you navigate your city, by using AR (augmented reality) to display digital directions on top of real-world images, using your iPhone’s camera.

To switch it on, simply go to Settings on the side menu -> Labs -> Enable Way Finder. You will find it while navigating with Live Directions. As it’s an experiment, we’d love to get your feedback on it.

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovitapp.com

We’ve added a search bar to the Stations tab. Now you can search for any address or location in your city, and quickly see all stops, stations and shared mobility options surrounding it.

We’ve added a search bar to the Stations tab. Now you can search for any address or location in your city, and quickly see all stops, stations and shared mobility options surrounding it. Long tap on your chosen location to view related actions, such as getting directions to and from it.

Know in real-time how crowded your next bus will be.
Avoid the crowd and keep socially distanced with real-time crowding information: Know whether or not there will be seats available on the next bus, or whether it will have enough space to properly social distance.

Three occupancy levels will be displayed:
- Available seats
- Standing only
- Crowded (will be displayed in red)

*The feature will be displayed in selected cities based on available occupancy information provided by the local transit agency.

Also, fixed a critical bug for voiceover users in Live Navigation.

Know in real-time how crowded your station/next bus is and help others know by self-reporting
* Know whether or not your station/next bus will be crowded based on user reports from within the last 10 minutes (when available).
* Help other riders know in advance how crowded the station/next bus is by reporting crowdedness levels.
